scripts.rollup: mkdirp dist && rollup lib/index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/bundle-rollup.js
scripts.browserify: mkdirp dist && npm run build-node && browserify lib_node | uglifyjs -c > dist/bundle-browserify.js
scripts.browserify-es5-only: mkdirp dist && browserify lib_es5 | uglifyjs -c > dist/bundle-browserify-es5-only.js
scripts.webpack: mkdirp dist && npm run build-node && webpack -p lib_node dist/bundle-webpack.js
scripts.all: npm run rollup && npm run browserify && npm run browserify-es5-only && npm run webpack && npm run webpack-es5-only
